text: Ugh, Im already dreading tax season. It's such a mess.
Youre not kidding. I saw this tweet that said Americans spend six point one billion hours a year just on tax prep. Billion. With a B.
Oh my god, six point one billion hours? Thats insane. Think of what we could be doing with that time. Thats lifetimes of productivity just flushed away filling out forms.
Exactly. Its a tax on our time on top of being a tax on our money. They need to simplify the whole system.
